# Navid
## Overview
---
## Connections
Arbitrary Connection To: [[Villistine the Sea Dragon]] ; Villistine knew Navid.
Child: [[Kraken King]] ; Navid is the son of the Kraken King.
Supervisor: [[Armse Broadnose]] ; Armse was an advisor to Navid.
General Family: [[Gorim the Boarslayer]] ; Gorim and Navid are brothers.
General Family: [[Talinn Runewright]] ; Navid and Talinn are brothers.
Parent: [[Nyssa Tasstani]] ; Navid is the father of Nyssa.
Arbitrary Connection To: [[Ajinan]] ; Navid was the king of Ajinan.
Resident: [[Ajinan]] ; Navid lived in Ajinan.
